name: Nobel Prize Winners 1901-2016
content:
Description: data about all Nobel Prize winners, 1901-2016.

Source: [Data.world](https://data.world/sya/nobel-prize-winners)

Columns:

* First name (string): first name of the recipient
* Last name (string): last name of the recipient
* Date of birth (date): what calendar month / day / year that winner was born on
* Country of birth (string): what city that recipient was born in
* City of birth (string): what city that recipient was born in
* Year of award (number): what year that person had won the Nobel Prize
* Category (string): the prize winner's field of study, such as economics or medicine
* Motivation (string): reason for their winning of the Nobel Prize.
